DOC.brief_title: A Study With Health Educational Material Health Promotion Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: Age > =18 , < 80 Cancer survivor ( pathologically confirm ) Finished primary treatment ( surgery , radiotherapy , chemotherapy ) > = 1 year cancer diagnosis No evidence recurrence , metastasis , second primary cancer No evidence hereditary cancer ECOG 0,1,2 Ability read Korean educational material ECOG 3,4 Disagree investigator study purpose
